snippet.title: Weapon Of Choice DX [Switch/PS4/XOne] Console Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
Weapon Of Choice DX is a high-energy, side-scroller in which each playable character is unique with their own special weapon and abilities!


More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/15515-weapon-of-choice-dx/


Released for Xbox 360 and PC (Steam) in 2015, Weapon Of Choice DX is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4 and Xbox One.

#WeaponOfChoice #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
